subject_terms_3: Little India Conservation Area Little India Sub Zone History  Poster art Acrylic painting
materials_name: acrylic paint  canvas board canvas (textile material)
physical_appearance: "This is an acrylic painted billboard featuring a collage of the sights and people of Little India. The title, ""A Passage to Little India"" is painted in red and yellow in bold across the top panel."
sgcool_label_text: "The large billboard painting covers the history of Little India in Singapore through archival and recent pictures of the community. The compiled images of people and places integrate texts and titles like a movie poster, providing an introductory note to the visualised narrative of the artist's journey through Little India, past and present, which is further fleshed out through the two accompanying pieces of ""Passage to Little India""."
subject_terms_2: Billboards  Little India (Singapore)  Communities  Rawanchaikul, Navin Local history  Acrylic painting  Photomontage
